glsa.title: PowerDNS: Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in PowerDNS could lead to a temporary Denial of Service.

background.p: The PowerDNS Nameserver is an authoritative-only nameserver which uses a flexible backend architecture.

description.p: A vulnerability has been reported in the DNSPacket::expand method of dnspacket.cc.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a temporary Denial of Service by sending a random stream of bytes to the PowerDNS Daemon.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PowerDNS users should upgrade to the latest version:
